content: hooke�b�maxin� small skull tote designbyhookedbymaxine american terms used chain chain materials used skip skip 1 skein of k+c essential cotton color zion slip_stitch slip_stitch 4mm crochet hook single_crochet single_crochet tapestry needle double_crochet double_crochet 4 3mm d-rings sc3tog single_crochet 3 stitches together body 1 chain 46 2 2dc in the 4th chain from hook double_crochet in the next 41 6dc in the last chain double_crochet in the bottom loop of the next 41 st 3dc in the last st with the 2 double_crochet and ch3 slip_stitch into the top of the chain 3 3 ch3 counts as a double_crochet here and throughout the pattern double_crochet in each st of the round slip_stitch into the chain 3 4 repeat 5 ch3 double_crochet in the next 3 st *ch2 skip 2 st double_crochet in the next 4 st* repeat until you reach the end of the round chain 2 skip the last 2 st and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of the ch3 hooke�b�maxin� 6 ch5 counts as a double_crochet + ch2 *skip 4 st 4 double_crochet around the ch2 space ch2* repeat until you reach the end of the round 3 double_crochet in the last ch2 space and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch5 7 ch3 3dc around the ch2 space *ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space* repeat until you reach the end of the round ch2 slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch3 8 ch5 counts as a double_crochet + ch2 *skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch2* repeat 1x skip 4 st 4 double_crochet in ch2 space ch8 skip the next ch2 space *skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch2* repeat until you reach the end of the round 3dc in the last ch2 space and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of the ch5 9 ch3 3dc around the ch2 space ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space ch6 skip 4 st 4sc around the ch8 space ch6 *skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space ch2* repeat until you reach the end of the round slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of the ch3 10 ch5 counts as a double_crochet + ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around the ch2 space ch2 skip 4st and 4dc around the ch2 space ch6 skip 4 st in the single_crochet from previous round double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch6 *skip 4 st 4dc around next ch2 space ch2* repeat until the end of the round 3dc around the last ch2 space and slip_stitch into the 3rd loop of ch5 11 ch3 3dc in ch2 space ch2 skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch6 skip 4 st 2sc around ch6 space *single_crochet in double_crochet single_crochet in ch1 space* repeat 2x single_crochet in double_crochet 2sc in ch6 space should have 11 single_crochet total chain 6 *skip 4 st 4dc around ch2 space ch2 * repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch into the 3rd loop
